channel.title: ete3 on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in ete3 on Memo Tut

item.title: Super easy molecular phylogenetic tree creation technique that I do not want to teach anyone
item.description: # Phylogenetic tree estimation Introducing a super simple molecular phylogenetic tree creation method using ETE Toolkit. (Figure: From http://etetoolkit.org/documentation/ete-build/) Tool to use BLAST (sequence similarity search) MAFFT (alignment) https://mafft.cbrc.jp/alignment/server/ trimAl (correction of alignment for phylogenetic tree construction), optional http://trimal.cgenomics.org/ RAxML (Physical tree calculation) https://sco.h-its.org/exelixis/web/software/raxml/index.html FigTreeoriTOL(Drawingphylogenetictree) Rough flow BLAST sequence similarity search is performed on the 16S rRNA sequence (?) of the target species for which you want to see the phylogenetic relationship with related species against the sequence database (16S rRNA, RefSeq, nr, etc.
